title: Air Conditioned, Radiant Baseboard Heat, Late Fee Forgiveness
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Private Entrance', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Package Acceptance', '-Air Conditioned', '-Laundry Facility', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Additional Storage', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability is subject to change.']
